Desc.entry: Ann Beedham offers various illustrated talks, her subjects include; "Randini - The man who helped Houdini (hear about the local lad who gave Houdini his most iconic escape trick)", "The Suffragette, the Silverworker and the Sheik's Creator (three local women's tales)", "Literary Peak (various authors and their links with the Peak District)", "Some Interesting Local Personalities (Joseph Paxton, James Montgomery, George Fletcher, Wynne de Lyle, Harvey Teasdale) as well as general talks about the city and Derbyshire. Ann is a local author of books on the history and characters in Sheffield and the Peak district and is also a qualified tour guide who can lead walks or tours. Fee charged
